birth_place.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区北海市

description.zh-cn: 中国药理学家，曾任湖南医学院教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Chinese pharmacologist, who served as a professor and doctoral supervisor at Hunan Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广西壮族自治区下辖的地级市，是郭兆贵的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Guo Zhaogui.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所高等医学院校，郭兆贵曾在此担任教授和博士生导师。
description.en: A higher medical college in China where Guo Zhaogui once served as a professor and doctoral supervisor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中南大学下属的医学院，是郭兆贵的母校。
description.en: The medical school affiliated with Central South University, and the alma mater of Guo Zhaogui.

description.zh-cn: 郭兆贵是广西省北海市人。
description.en: Guo Zhaogui is from Beihai, Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 郭兆贵曾任湖南医学院教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Guo Zhaogui served as a professor and doctoral supervisor at Hunan Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，郭兆贵是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Guo Zhaogui is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，郭兆贵是湘雅医学院的校友。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Guo Zhaogui is an alumnus of Xiangya School of Medicine.
